FAQ.title: What is a personal loan?
FAQ.answer: A personal loan is an unsecured loan provided by financial institutions, such as banks or NBFCs, to individuals for various personal purposes. Unlike secured loans, personal loans do not require collateral.

FAQ.title: What can I use personal loan for?
FAQ.answer: Personal loans can be used for a variety of purposes, including debt consolidation, home improvements, medical expenses, travel, weddings, or any other major personal expenses.

FAQ.title: How much can I borrow with a personal loan?
FAQ.answer: The loan amount can you borrow depends on several factos, such as your creditworthiness, income, and the lender's policies. Typically, personal loan offered by LendingBharat range from ₹10,000 to ₹2,00,000.

FAQ.title: What is repayment period for a personal loan?
FAQ.answer: Personal loan terms vary, but at LendingBharat it range from 6 to 12 months. Shorter loan terms mean higher monthly payments but lower overall interest costs.

FAQ.title: How do LendingBharat determine my eligibility for a personal loan?
FAQ.answer: We consider several factors, including your credit score, income, employment history, existing debts, and the loan amount you're requesting. A higher credit score and a stable income increase your chances of approval.

FAQ.title: What is the interest rate for a personal loan?
FAQ.answer: Interest rates on personal loans can vary widely based on your creditworthiness and the lender's policies. Generally, borrowers with better credit scores receive lower interest rates ranging from 24-60% PA.

FAQ.title: Are there any fees associated with personal loans?
FAQ.answer: Yes, personal loans may come with various fees, such as origination fees, prepayment penalties, or late payment fees. It's essential to review our fee structure before accepting the loan.

FAQ.title: Can I get a personal loan with bad credit?
FAQ.answer: It might be challenging to get a personal loan with bad credit, but some lenders specialize in offering loans to individuals with lower credit scores. However, these loans might have higher interest rates.

FAQ.title: How long does it take toy get approved for a personal loan?
FAQ.answer: The approval process varies among lenders & banks, but it typically takes a few days to a couple of weeks. But here at LendingBharat, we approve & disburse your loan within 24 hours.

FAQ.title: Can I prepay or pay off my personal loan early?
FAQ.answer: We allow early repayment without any prepayment penalties. Paying off your loan early can save you money on interest.Remember, before applying for a personal loan, it's crucial to assess your financial situation, compare offers from different lenders, and read the terms and conditions carefully to make an informed decision.
